question: Nar Bahadur Bhandari, who passed away recently, was the former Chief Minister of which Indian state?
explanation: Nar Bahadur Bhandari (76), the former Chief Minister of Sikkim, has passed away in New Delhi on July 16, 2017. He was the founder leader of Sikkim Sangram Parishad, who governed Sikkim from 1979 to 1994.
